verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
when you call my name,
I'll hear your voice
and i will rise,
and i will run (2x)
after you

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You light my path,
and guide my way
so I can rise,
and I can run (2x)
after you

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
My strength's renewed,
my hope restored
My vision clears,
as I wait (2x)
upon you Lord
